name: Boobie Beach
description:
„This game is great...“ (Raynor.Z)

„Excellent game! EA will be calling, mark my words. ;)“ (RevBillyG)

„That's one awesome game.“ (the_rex)

„Hehe, cute. A pretty darned good game too.“ (dragonfliet)

„Great game.“ (BITE_ME)

„Best Game Evar!“ (Bort Simpson)

The busty babes of Boobie Beach battle it out in one hot, bouncy tournament. The rules are simple: One girl on each side of the net. Then the ball is put into the match. You must use the girl's boobs to bounce the ball to the other side of the net. If the ball drops into the water on your side of the net, your opponent will get a point. You will get the point, if the ball goes down on the other side.

Features:
- Six different girls with different „physical abilities“.
- Beautiful, handdrawn graphics.
- A nice and catchy soundtrack.
- A boobcamp to train your skills.
- Hiscorelist.
- Ball and boob physics are based on the TITnology-Engine.
